type.description:
## Raining

---


[Block Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/raining).

Checks whether it's currently raining in the world that the block is ins.

Type ID: `apugli:raining`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:raining"
}
```
